architecture_decisions: REST API in separate knowledge.ts route file (not added to workspaces.ts)
3 sub-components for file size discipline: KnowledgeFileForm (~155 lines), KnowledgeFileViewer (~145 lines), KnowledgeFilesPanel (~210 lines)
KnowledgeFileViewer uses lazy content loading via useQuery enabled:expanded
CollapsibleSection extended with onToggle callback for lazy-load extensibility
Types (KnowledgeFile, KnowledgeFileMeta, KnowledgeFileCategory) defined in KnowledgeFileForm.tsx and re-exported
